GV06dantyovu:2: chandasy adhyayane prāpte viduṣām atha dhīmatām |
GV06dantyovu:3: bakāre saṃśayo nityam auṣṭhyaṃ dantyam iti sma ha || 1.2 ||
GV06dantyovu:5: muktā dantyā prayojyāma auṣṭhyān vakṣye kramāhitaḥ || 1.3 ||
GV06dantyovu:6: bhaparaṃ yatra dṛśyetāniṃgye sparśanaṃ kva cit |
GV06dantyovu:7: auṣṭyaṃ tatra pade dhīro bibhīto bibhratīr yathā || 1.4 ||
GV06dantyovu:8: ādyudātte bale bāṇe bila śabde tathaiva ca |
GV06dantyovu:11: balāsaṃ bāhū ācāryāḥ sarvāsv eva vibhaktiṣu || 1.6 ||
GV06dantyovu:13: bradhnaḥ kilbiṣaṃ vaḥ ketuḥ kumbaṃ bādhiṣṭa bāliti || 1.7 ||
GV06dantyovu:14: bāhuṃ bohi tathā baṃdhur bahubādhe bṛhac ca yat |
GV06dantyovu:17: bahavaḥ kābavaṃ bāhvor bodha bahve tathaiva ca || 1.9 ||
GV06dantyovu:18: tathāa badhnyaṃ tābuvaṃ bahvīr navamaḥ saṃprakīrttitāḥ |
GV06dantyovu:19: ete sarveṣu śabdeṣu prathamasparśyā hi matāḥ || 1.10 ||
GV06dantyovu:20: vaibādha devabandhuṃ ca vibaddhas tu vibandhuṣu |
GV06dantyovu:21: dvitīya sparśyo vijñeyo vibabādhe tathaiva ca || 1.11 ||
GV06dantyovu:22: bāhau bāhavo bahulaṃ budhnyaṃ baddhkam eva ca |
GV06dantyovu:23: ete sarve bhavanty oṣṭhyā ye noktās te tu dantajāḥ || 1.12 ||
GV06dantyovu:26: daśanāgreṇa saṃspṛṣṭyo na tu pīḍāsu yojayet || 2.1 ||
GV06dantyovu:27: kambalaṃ balbajaṃ bījaṃ libujā baṇmhāṃ asi |
GV06dantyovu:28: biṣkale brahma barjahye śabale bedhiṣe bayaḥ || 2.2 ||
GV06dantyovu:29: bahiṣṭhaḥ budhnyaḥ paḍbīśam arbudaṃ badhiras tathā |
GV06dantyovu:31: kabru pībasi baṃdhuraṃ kaṃbūkāṃ balinas tathā |
GV06dantyovu:34: bato batāsi bandhuṃ ca bisaṃ klībaṃ buje bujaḥ || 2.5 ||
GV06dantyovu:38: baṃdhanaṃ yatra śeṣaṃ syād ābadhe me nidraśanam || 2.7 ||
GV06dantyovu:39: alābu bajaḥ bāṇaṃ syād ādyudātto yadā bhavet |
GV06dantyovu:40: brahma śabdaṃ tu sarvārtham auṣṭhyam eva vidur budhāḥ || 2.8 ||
GV06dantyovu:43: bibhed ādiṣu bhedāś ca pari pūrvaṃ bale tathā |
GV06dantyovu:44: baṃdhu vā siṃdhurapara eteṣāṃ tu balaḥ kva cit || 2.10 ||
GV06dantyovu:45: tuchubdaś cubukaś caiva babhūvuś ca babhūvuṣī |
